701260f-b.text:
(1)
Hobart Avenue, at the N.E. corner of Middletown Road, showing an old farmhouse and barns. The view is south toward
Middletown Road.
May 13, 1938
P. L. Sperr
(2)
A view of the house as seen from Middletown Road. Also shown is the rear of Public School No. 71, fronting on Roberts
Avenue.
May 13, 1938
P. L. Sperr
(3)
Another view of the rear of Public School 7l, looking
north along the west side of Jarvis Avenue.
May 13, 1938
P. L. Sperr
701260f-b.folder: Hobart Avenue & Middletown Road, Bronx, NY
